metadata.title: CVE-2024-44990 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:bonding: fix null pointer deref in bond_ipsec_offload_okWe must check if there is an active slave before dereferencing the pointer.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
